tasks.label: ConfigMaps
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/configMaps && kubectl apply -f monitoring/configMaps

tasks.label: Secrets
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/secrets-dev && kubectl apply -f monitoring/secrets-dev

tasks.label: Build Grafana
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build monitoring -f monitoring/Dockerfile.grafana -t grafana-custom

tasks.label: Build User
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build user -f user/Dockerfile -t python-custom

tasks.label: Build Teacher
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build teacher-panel -f teacher-panel/Dockerfile -t node-custom

tasks.label: Deploy
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/k8s && kubectl apply -f monitoring/k8s && kubectl apply -f frontend.yaml
